headline: Expand Energy: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: OKLAHOMA CITY (AP) — Expand Energy Corporation (EXE) on Tuesday reported third-quarter net income of $547 million. The Oklahoma City-based company said it had net income of $2.28 per share. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring gains, came to 97 cents per share.

headline: Expand Energy: Western Haynesville Steals The Show (Rating Upgrade)

headline: Expand Energy Corporation Reports Third Quarter 2025 Results
summary: OKLAHOMA CITY, Oct. 28, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Expand Energy Corporation (NASDAQ: EXE) (“Expand Energy” or the “Company”) today reported third quarter 2025 financial and operating results. Net cash provided by operating activities of $1,201 millionNet income of $547 million, or $2.28 per fully diluted share; adjusted net income(1) of $234 million, or $0.97 per diluted shareAdjusted EBITDAX(1) of $1,082 millionProduced ~7.33 Bcfe/d net (92% natural gas)Reduced midpoint of full year 2025 capital

headline: You’ve Likely Never Heard of This Natural Gas Stock, But It Could Be the Best Way to Play AI in 2026
summary: Expand Energy is emerging as a top AI play for 2026, riding a surge in U.S. data center energy needs; it recently returned $585 million to shareholders and posts high cash flow.
